thread.section_title: PickleballCentral Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PickleballCentral | pickleballcentral.com | 4 of 114
thread.title: Loretta Pippin

author: Loretta Pippin
title: Loretta Pippin
text:
I love Pickleball Central! I found great deals, the site was easy to use and my package arrived on time! Because of the great deals I found, I got my husband awesome stuff for his twice weekly pickleball game and all the other players were envious of all of new gear. One guy said " Your wife loves you more than my wife loves me. You got more stuff than me.
We will be shopping at Pickleball Cental and I am telling my friends to shop here too.
